sentence: Accessible Keys for Video[Space Bar] toggles play/pause;[Right/Left Arrows] seeks the video forwards and back (5 sec );[Up/Down Arrows] increase/decrease volume;[M] toggles mute on/off;[F] toggles fullscreen on/off (Except IE 11);The [Tab] key may be used in combination with the [Enter/Return] key to navigate and activate control buttons, such as caption on/off.I am pleased to join the FedNow Early Adopter Workshop.1 With the technical testing phase of the FedNowâ  Service kicking off in mid-September, I want to particularly thank the early adopters for the important investments they are making to prepare for the day when the FedNow Service goes live next year.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it does not provide any information or implications regarding the stance of the Federal Reserve.

sentence: Together with our partners, we will be ready to launch the FedNow Service between May and July of 2023, bringing this innovative core instant payment infrastructure to financial institutions of every size across America.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it pertains to the launch of the FedNow Service, which is a payment infrastructure initiative. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance on monetary policy.

sentence: We have been working hard to deliver on time, but ultimately the number of American businesses and households that are able to access instant payments will depend on financial services providers making the necessary investments to upgrade our payments infrastructure.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it focuses on the efforts to improve the payments infrastructure and the role of financial services providers. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance towards monetary policy.

sentence: Americans rely on the payment system all day every day to make purchases, pay bills, and get paidâwithout ever needing to consider the complex infrastructure that is operating under the hood.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it does not provide any indication or implications regarding the stance of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) towards interest rates or the economy. It solely discusses the reliance of Americans on the payment system.

sentence: American households and businesses want and deserve payment transactions that work seamlessly, reliably, and efficiently.Fostering a safe, efficient, and widely accessible payments infrastructure has been a central part of the Fed's mission since the very beginning.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it focuses on the Fed's mission of fostering a safe and efficient payments infrastructure, which does not directly impact the stance of monetary policy.

sentence: The Federal Reserve Banks all around the country have provided payment and settlement services alongside the private sector for more than 100 years.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the historical role of Federal Reserve Banks in providing payment and settlement services, without indicating any stance or implications on current or future monetary policy.

sentence: Over that period, we have repeatedly innovated and invested in collaboration with the private sector to transform the payment system, using the latest technology to better meet the needs of businesses and households.2 Now, after extensive industry engagement and planning, the Federal Reserve is on track to deliver the FedNow Service by May to July of 2023.The FedNow Service will transform the way everyday payments are made throughout the economy, bringing substantial gains to households and businesses through the ability to send instant payments at any time on any day, and the funds being immediately available to recipients to make other payments or manage cash flow efficiently.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the Federal Reserve's efforts to transform the payment system and deliver the FedNow Service. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance on monetary policy.

sentence: Immediate availability of funds could be especially important for households managing their finances paycheck to paycheck or small businesses with cash flow constraints.
reason: This sentence suggests a dovish stance on US monetary policy as it emphasizes the importance of immediate availability of funds for households and small businesses with cash flow constraints, indicating a focus on supporting economic stability and growth.

sentence: Having the capacity to manage money in real time could help households avoid costly late payment fees or free up working capital for small businesses to finance growth.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the benefits of managing money in real time for households and small businesses, without directly addressing the stance of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) or its implications on monetary policy.

sentence: Indeed, during the pandemic, we witnessed how essential rapid access to funds can be, as many households started spending emergency relief payments on the day they were received.3To deliver on the promise of a payment system for the future, the Federal Reserve has made a substantial commitment to the FedNow platform, which has benefited from the innovative technologies and approaches proven by global technology companies that are vital for today's always on digital economy.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the Federal Reserve's commitment to the FedNow platform and the importance of rapid access to funds during the pandemic. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance on monetary policy.

sentence: Our cloud-first design, unique among central bank instant payment services, positions us for the future by enabling not only the throughput and scalability required for high-volume retail transactions but also broad geographic points of resiliency to ensure continuous service.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the design and capabilities of a central bank instant payment service, without providing any indication of its impact on the monetary policy stance.

sentence: Cloud-first design affords other key technology components such as self-healing processes and automation, which add to operational resiliency.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses cloud-first design and its technological components, which do not directly impact the monetary policy stance.

sentence: And our development processes are agile, allowing us to deliver new features faster to financial institutions of all sizes as they are ready to adopt them based on their priorities.We have also invested heavily in stakeholder engagement to ensure readiness for service adoption through efforts like the pilot program, the FedNow Explorer resource, the FedNow Community, the service provider showcase, and the FedNow Early Adopter Workshop.4 To advance the goal of nationwide reach for instant payments, we have worked closely with the private-sector RTP instant payment service on message specifications to ensure alignment in support of routing interoperability.Just as the Federal Reserve has made a substantial commitment to our new instant payment infrastructure, we are calling on industry stakeholders to do the same.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the Federal Reserve's efforts in developing and promoting instant payment infrastructure, which does not directly impact the decision-making process regarding interest rates or other monetary policy tools.

sentence: The time is now for all key stakeholdersâfinancial institutions, core service providers, software companies, and application developersâto devote the resources necessary to support instant payments.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the need for key stakeholders to allocate resources for supporting instant payments, which does not directly relate to the stance of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) on interest rates or monetary policy.

sentence: This means upgrading back-office processes, evaluating accounting procedures to accommodate a seven-business-day week, arranging liquidity providers, deploying a new customer-facing application, and promoting instant payments for key use cases to customers.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses operational and technological aspects of upgrading back-office processes, evaluating accounting procedures, arranging liquidity providers, deploying a new customer-facing application, and promoting instant payments for key use cases to customers. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance on monetary policy.

sentence: As the service providers featured at this event will demonstrate in the coming days, parts of the industry have already seized on the opportunity to build new services and capabilities that support instant payments.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the actions of service providers in the industry, which does not directly impact the monetary policy decisions made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC).

sentence: These efforts will increase competition in the market for end-user services and promote innovationâkey benefits from providing the FedNow Service as a neutral platform, accessible to financial institutions of all sizes nationwide.I would like to personally thank our early adopters.
reason: This sentence suggests that the FedNow Service aims to promote competition and innovation in the market for end-user services. It emphasizes the benefits of providing a neutral platform accessible to financial institutions of all sizes. However, the sentence does not directly address US monetary policy, making it irrelevant in terms of its implications on monetary policy.

sentence: The input that you have provided has been instrumental for our team as they have designed and built the service, and the time and energy that you have committed to this effort is important for a successful launch.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it pertains to the input and effort put into designing and building a service, which does not directly impact the stance of the Federal Reserve. Therefore, it has no implications on whether the policy is hawkish, dovish, or neutral.

sentence: I want to call on additional banks and core service providers to join your commitment to prepare for adoption of the FedNow Service.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it pertains to the adoption of the FedNow Service, which is a real-time payments infrastructure. It does not provide any implications on the monetary policy stance, thus not being hawkish, dovish, or neutral.
